biocontainers.name: perm
biocontainers.summary: Perm (periodic seed mapping) uses periodic spaced seeds to significantly improve mapping efficiency for large reference genomes when compared to state-of-the-art programs.

biotools.summary: PerM (Periodic Seed Mapping) uses periodic spaced seeds to significantly improve mapping efficiency for large reference genomes when compared to state-of-the-art programs.
